transaction_types.name: RECEIVE
transaction_types.description: Receive a material into your wallet from a source.

transaction_types.name: EXCHANGE
transaction_types.description: Exchange a material for another material.

transaction_types.name: USE
transaction_types.description: Use a material for wishing on banners.

source_types.name: PURCHASES
source_types.description: Top-ups are purchases made in the game to obtain Genesis Crystals.

source_types.name: COMMISSIONS
source_types.description: Commissions are daily tasks that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

source_types.name: BLESSING_OF_THE_WELKIN_MOON
source_types.description: Blessing of the Welkin Moon is a premium system that rewards players by logging in daily.

source_types.name: BATTLE_PASS
source_types.description: Battle Pass is a system that allows players to obtain rewards by completing challenges.

source_types.name: SPIRAL_ABYSS
source_types.description: Spiral Abyss is a special type of domain where players defeat enemies and try challenges.

source_types.name: EVENTS
source_types.description: Primogems obtained through events

source_types.name: ADVENTURE_RANK
source_types.description: Adventure Rank is a system that increases based on the player's experience.

source_types.name: ACHIEVEMENTS
source_types.description: Achievements are task or challenges that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

source_types.name: CHECK_IN
source_types.description: Check-In is a system that allows players to obtain rewards by logging in daily.

source_types.name: TRUST_RANK
source_types.description: Trust Rank is a system within the Serenitea Pot that allows players to obtain rewards.

source_types.name: PROMO_CODES
source_types.description: Promo Codes are limited-time codes that can be redeemed in exchange for rewards.

source_types.name: MAIL
source_types.description: Mail is a system that allows players to receive messages from players and the developer.

source_types.name: QUESTS
source_types.description: Quests are series of tasks that the player may complete to obtain rewards.

source_types.name: TUTORIALS
source_types.description: Tutorials are a series of gameplay instructions that introduce new game mechanics.

source_types.name: DISCOVERY
source_types.description: Discovery refers to the act of discovering Domains, Waypoints and Statues of Teyvat.

source_types.name: CHESTS
source_types.description: Chests are objects that can be found all throughout Teyvat.

source_types.name: DOMAINS
source_types.description: Domains are special areas that allow the player to test their skills against enemies.

source_types.name: STATUE_OF_THE_SEVEN
source_types.description: Statues of The Seven are structures found around all of Teyvat.

source_types.name: ADVENTURER_HANDBOOK
source_types.description: The Adventurer Handbook is a book, tracks achievements and progress and offers rewards.

source_types.name: FROSTBEARING_TREE
source_types.description: The Frostbearing Tree is an offering system and point of interest located in Dragonspine.

source_types.name: LUMENSTONE_ASCENSION
source_types.description: The Lumenstone system is an offering system based in the The Chasm, Liyue.

source_types.name: SACRED_SAKURA
source_types.description: The Sacred Sakura is an offering system and point of interest located in Narukami Island.

source_types.name: TREE_OF_DREAMS
source_types.description: The Tree of Dreams is an offering system and point of interest located in Vanarana, Sumeru.

source_types.name: AMRITA_POOL
source_types.description: The Amrita Pool is an offering system and point of interest located in Vourukasha Oasis.

source_types.name: FOUNTAIN_OF_LUCINE
source_types.description: The Fountain of Lucine is an offering system located in the Court of Fontaine.

source_types.name: CHARACTER_ASCENSION
source_types.description: Character Ascension is a system that allows players to level up their characters.

source_types.name: SURVEYS
source_types.description: Surveys are questionnaires completed to obtain rewards.

source_types.name: OTHER
source_types.description: Materials obtained through other means

material_types.name: PRIMOGEMS
material_types.description: Primogems are a premium currency in Genshin Impact.

material_types.name: GENESIS_CRYSTALS
material_types.description: Genesis Crystals are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

material_types.name: ACQUAINT_FATE
material_types.description: Acquaint Fate is a Fate item used to perform wishes.

material_types.name: INTERTWINED_FATE
material_types.description: Intertwined Fate is a Fate item used to perform wishes.

exchange_types.name: GENESIS_CRYSTALS_EXCHANGE
exchange_types.description: Genesis Crystals are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

exchange_types.name: PRIMOGEMS_EXCHANGE
exchange_types.description: Primogems are the premium currency in Genshin Impact.

exchange_types.name: STARGLITTER_EXCHANGE
exchange_types.description: Starglitter is a currency obtained by exchanging Primogems in Paimon's Bargains.

exchange_types.name: STARDUST_EXCHANGE
exchange_types.description: Stardust is a currency obtained by exchanging Primogems in Paimon's Bargains.

usage_types.name: INTERTWINED_FATE_WISH
usage_types.description: Intertwined Fate is a Fate used to wish in the Character Event Banner and Weapon Event Banner.

usage_types.name: ACQUAINT_FATE_WISH
usage_types.description: Acquaint Fate is a Fate used to wish in the Standard Banner and Beginner Banner.
